name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Immut<'a>, K, V, Type>::into_leaf

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc:
Exposes the leaf portion of any leaf or internal node.

 Returns a raw ptr to avoid invalidating other references to this node.

doc: Exposes the leaf portion of any leaf or internal node in an immutable tree.
